text: “Digau hai mee dabu, goodou hagalongo! Nia daangada Israel, goodou hagalongo hagahumalia! Digau ala e dau gi di madawaawa king, goodou hagalongo labelaa! Go goodou ala bolo e gabunga godou daangada gi di tonu, goodou ga hagi aga. Goodou guu hai di hele i lodo o Mizpah, di gubenge e holo gi hongo di Gonduu Tabor,
